name: Until Morning Light: PT Demo
description:
Not intended for children or those of a nervous disposition. There are NO intentional jumpscares or screamers in this game! 

A survival horror done in RPG Maker MV. It was my first attempt with the program and using largely either standard RTP assets, derivatives of such, assets from OpenGameArt and other CC-0 sources. The only exception is a DLC pack legally obtained through Steam from the VX Ace music DLC. (Terms of the DLC allowed usage in all RPG/IG Maker products.)

Notice: Neither of the ports to Mac, Linux have been tested. Please note that I cannot guarantee their function due to inability to test on those platforms.

Content may include or refer to:
Various means of death, including violent or accidental body harm
Mind control/manipulation from supernatural forces
Isolation
Imprisonment
Physical assault
Possible panic attacks
Unexpected loud sounds in bad endings.
